Upgrade to an Executive Club-level room or Suite for exclusive amenities like hot buffet breakfasts and afternoon tea. Look out over Chandigarh from our stunning rooftop pool, work out in the JW Fitness Club or indulge in a spa treatment. Our hotel's popular restaurants include an in-house microbrewery, international buffet and 24-hour room service. Host a meeting or special event in one of our versatile conference and wedding venues, including Grand Ballroom and charming lawn venue. Take advantage of our catering and expert planning services to ensure an occasion to remember.

The hotel is part of a premium development that includes the Elante Shopping mall and an office complex that houses key multi-national companies and Diplomatic missions.
